body.name: Charcoal Toothbrush Ultra Soft for Sensitive Gums - Teeth Whitening Brush for Adults & Children [Extra Family Pack] - Medium Tip Bristles (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 36 mins
features: Improved Design: Our new improved black toothbrush pack is designed to eliminate 99% of plaque with total convenience. Get the best for your oral health with the new Dental Expert Charcoal toothbrush that has angled bristles to sweep away all the plaque.
Power Tip Long and Soft Bristles: The long, soft, and effective bristles of our charcoal toothbrush are comfortable to use and it is a reliable product to use with regular or charcoal toothpaste.

Improve Gum Health: Our Oral B charcoal toothbrush is best to improve gum health, reduce gingivitis and restore optimal dental hygiene in just four weeks because it to design to easily access and properly clean all the parts of the mouth.
Premium Offer: Get maximum value with our super pack of 5 top quality Dental Expert black toothbrushes that you can use for up to 15 months at a bargain price or get 1 pack for the entire family.

Money-Back Guarantee: Don’t forget to add these ultra-soft charcoal toothbrushes to your cart for your whole family. If for any reason you’re not happy with our product, we will make it right and process a refund for you. Get your pack risk-free today with our premium money-back guarantee.
body.description: The Dental Expert Charcoal toothbrush provides comprehensive oral and dental health care. The black charcoal-infused bristles effectively clean teeth to prevent plaque build-up and cavities. This toothbrush is designed to whiten teeth by removing different kinds of stains. The ultra-soft bristles are ideal for sensitive teeth and inflamed gums. Thoroughly clean even the hard-to-reach areas of the mouth with the Dental Expert toothbrush. ● Optimizes charcoal-infused bristles ● Removes plaque and freshens breath ● Whitens teeth by removing surface stains ● Gently cleans sensitive teeth and gums Safety warning: ● Not intended for children three years and below. ● Replace toothbrush every three months

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality toothbrushes, soft bristles that deep clean
reviews.reviewText: Best toothbrushes I've used at this price point.Pros- Soft bristles, messages guns without irritating while charcoal infused bristles deep clean. Brush head compact enough to reach molars.Con- Only knock is the handle is plastic, not recyclable or biodegradable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: It's the best toothbrush on the market, super fine and soft bristles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: My daughter really liked these toothbrushes.And gave me some to try.I am a little bit picky about toothbrushes.And find a lot of them to big or to cheaply built.I really like these .They seem well made and the correct size for my mouth.I do feel I need to brush a little more gently as to not hurt my gums or teeth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft But Firm - Kinda Like a Really Good Paintbrush
reviews.reviewText: Comparing these to a really good paintbrush may seem weird, but that was what came to mind. I don't like many of the toothbrushes available in the local stores. I think they are trying too hard with complicated designs and they never seem soft or gentle enough. So I found these. The bristles are soft. It felt very comfortable to brush. The bristles felt springy. While they are soft, they hold their shape well, just like a really good fine art paintbrush. I set a reminder on my calendar to swap out at 3 months, and I felt the brush was still good - not worn out. The charcoal though had started to fade, as I expected it would. Overall, this is a really nice toothbrush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have used this brand for 3 years and like them.
reviews.reviewText: I like these for softness and the antimicrobial feature. I would not use charcoal toothpaste though. Read about both.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very flimsy tooth brush have to grab it tightly so it won’t bend, don’t recommend at all night as well pay a little extra for something that is better quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job!
reviews.reviewText: I enjoy the black look. Does an excellent job! I’m getting my teeth 87% cleaner since I’ve started using these tooth brushes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. The bristles might be considered super soft to some but they do the job.
Great price, nice and sturdy, doesn't fall apart after a couple of weeks.Win WinWill purchase again

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect toothbrushes for sensitive and receding gums.
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with my purchase. The toothbrush are just soft enough if you have receding and sensitive gums. this is what my dentist suggested I should use. Very soft toothbrush are very hard to find in regular stores or drugstores. they normally go by the category "ultra soft".The last one I got in a regular store was made by one of the big names (C........gate). These were the most uncomfortable toothbrush I have use to date. The handle kept on rotating in my hand and I couldn't get a good hold on the darn thing. You will think, these big name have been making toothbrushes for many decades, they should get it down path by now. But NO it was very unwieldy.The handle of these toothbrushes are very comfortable in your hand and are very easy to use. I will buy them again.

As I make my own activated charcoal toothpaste, it's important to have black bristles for my appeal.These are awesome, wouldn't say they are soft, more like medium soft.I like the size of head as it's small enough to reach those tough spots but still usable for adults & kids.My ONLY con to this brush set is all of them look the same, and this makes it a bit challenging when more than one family member wants to use them. A slight change in color set / style design would be really nice but nonetheless I love this brush set and will definitely buy again.
It is a great brush. It was not as soft as I was hoping, hard on younger children, my older child who is an adult loved it.

reviews.reviewTitle: there not medium there extra soft
reviews.reviewText: returned because they were not what I orderd medium is what I was going for
